definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row

sentences.english: Speaking: discuss the following questions about smoking in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就下列關於在工作場所吸菸的問題進行討論。

sentences.english: Listen to the interview with Mr. Malcolm Lang Land and answer the following questions.
sentences.chinese: 聽下面的對馬克姆朗蘭德的彩旗，回答下列問題。

sentences.english: The following equiment is for any Series 111 Accumulator.
sentences.chinese: 下列設備可用於任何111系列蓄能器。

sentences.english: The applicant for supervisory unit qualification shall submit the following documents to the SMCAC.
sentences.chinese: 申請監理單位資質，應當向市建委提供下列材料。

sentences.english: Underline the infinitives in the following sentences and tell their functions.
sentences.chinese: 用橫線劃出下列句子中的不定式，並說出它們的作用。

sentences.english: The various initiators can be grouped under the following headings .
sentences.chinese: 各種引發劑可按下列標題分類。

sentences.english: In your opinion, which of the following is the MOST IMPORTANT factor for the A. S . to be successful?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲下列哪一項是使問責製成功的最重要因素？

sentences.english: Prices on the item tender offer sheet shall be filled out in the following manner.
sentences.chinese: 投標分項報價表上的價格應按下列方式分開填寫。

sentences.english: The following tags provide generally used functionality in user documentation.
sentences.chinese: 下列標記提供了用戶文檔中常用的功能。

sentences.english: The following image is the tile floor of the ship's Solarium .
sentences.chinese: 下列的圖像是船的日浴室的磚瓦地板。

sentences.english: Which of the following statements can be inferred from the passage?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪一項敘述可以從本文中推論出來？

sentences.english: Give the tree structures for the following sentences, and show all movements that take place.
sentences.chinese: 畫出下列句子的樹形圖，並寫出所有發生的移位。

sentences.english: The speed with which a penetrant penetrates a surface flaw is influenced to the greatest extent by which of the following properties?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪種性能對滲透劑滲入表面缺陷的速度影響最大？

sentences.english: Match the dialogues with pictures below.
sentences.chinese: 將下列圖片與對話配配看。

sentences.english: If a competitor holsters a firearm during the course of fire, the following will apply.
sentences.chinese: 如果選手在比賽中將槍枝收回槍套，應適用下列條件。

sentences.english: We are sending you today by the American Railway Express, prepaid, the following books.
sentences.chinese: 我們已於今日，將下列書箱通知美國的鐵路快運您處。

definition: that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
the subject under discussion/the point at issue
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
to exclude/not including sth (when counting or listing)/except for
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
